---
title: "Blog posts"
layout: default
---

{% for post in site.posts %}
<h3><a href="{{ post.url }}">{{ post.title }}{% if post.subtitle %}: {{ post.subtitle }}{% endif %}</a></h3>
<p><small>Posed on {{ post.date | date: '%B %d, %Y' }}</small></p>
<p>{{ post.excerpt }}</p>
{% endfor %}

<h1>Articles by tag :{{ page.tag }}</h1>
<div>
    {% if site.tags[page.tag] %}
        {% for post in site.tags[page.tag] %}
            <a href="{{ post.url }}/">{{ post.title }}</a>
        {% endfor %}
    {% else %}
        <p>There are no posts for this tag.</p>
    {% endif %}
</div>
